member.name: T:Pansonic.SoftBasic
member.summary: 一个软件基础类，提供常用的一些静态方法 -> A software-based class that provides some common static methods

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.CalculateFileMD5(System.String)
member.summary: 获取文件的md5码 -> Get the MD5 code of the file
member.param: 文件的路径，既可以是完整的路径，也可以是相对的路径 -> The path to the file
member.example: 下面举例实现获取一个文件的md5码

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.CalculateStreamMD5(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: 获取数据流的md5码 -> Get the MD5 code for the data stream
member.param: 数据流，可以是内存流，也可以是文件流
member.example: 下面举例实现获取一个流的md5码

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.CalculateStreamMD5(System.String)
member.summary: 获取文本字符串信息的Md5码，编码为UTF8

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.CalculateStreamMD5(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: 获取文本字符串信息的Md5码，使用指定的编码

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.GetSizeDescription(System.Int64)
member.summary: 从一个字节大小返回带单位的描述
member.example: 比如说我们获取了文件的长度，这个长度可以来自于本地，也可以来自于数据库查询

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.GetTimeSpanDescription(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: 从一个时间差返回带单位的描述
member.example: 比如说我们获取了一个时间差信息

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.AddArrayData``1(``0[]@,``0[],System.Int32)
member.summary: 一个通用的数组新增个数方法，会自动判断越界情况，越界的情况下，会自动的截断或是填充 -> A common array of new methods, will automatically determine the cross-border situation, in the case of cross-border, will be automatically truncated or filled

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.ArrayExpandToLength``1(``0[],System.Int32)
member.summary: 将一个数组进行扩充到指定长度，或是缩短到指定长度 -> Extend an array to a specified length, or shorten to a specified length or fill

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.ArrayExpandToLengthEven``1(``0[])
member.summary: 将一个数组进行扩充到偶数长度 -> Extend an array to even lengths

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.IsTwoBytesEquel(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: 判断两个字节的指定部分是否相同 -> Determines whether the specified portion of a two-byte is the same
member.param: 第一个字节的起始位置
第二个字节的起始位置

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.IsTwoBytesEquel(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: 判断两个字节的指定部分是否相同 -> Determines whether the specified portion of a two-byte is the same

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.IsByteTokenEquel(System.Byte[],System.Guid)
member.summary: 判断两个数据的令牌是否相等 -> Determines whether the tokens of two data are equal

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.IsTwoTokenEquel(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: 判断两个数据的令牌是否相等 -> Determines whether the tokens of two data are equal

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.GetEnumValues``1
member.summary: 获取一个枚举类型的所有枚举值，可直接应用于组合框数据 -> Gets all the enumeration values of an enumeration type that can be applied directly to the combo box data

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.GetEnumFromString``1(System.String)
member.summary: 从字符串的枚举值数据转换成真实的枚举值数据 -> Convert enumeration value data from strings to real enumeration value data
member.param: 枚举的字符串的数据值

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.ByteToHexString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: 字节数据转化成16进制表示的字符串 -> Byte data into a string of 16 binary representations

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.ByteToHexString(System.Byte[],System.Char)
member.summary: 字节数据转化成16进制表示的字符串 -> Byte data into a string of 16 binary representations

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.ByteToHexString(System.String)
member.summary: 字符串数据转化成16进制表示的字符串 -> String data into a string of 16 binary representations

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.HexStringToBytes(System.String)
member.summary: 将16进制的字符串转化成Byte数据，将检测每2个字符转化，也就是说，中间可以是任意字符 -> Converts a 16-character string into byte data, which will detect every 2 characters converted, that is, the middle can be any character
member.param: 十六进制的字符串，中间可以是任意的分隔符

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.BytesReverseByWord(System.Byte[])
member.summary: 将byte数组按照双字节进行反转，如果为单数的情况，则自动补齐 -> Reverses the byte array by double byte, or if the singular is the case, automatically

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.BytesToAsciiBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: 将原始的byte数组转换成ascii格式的byte数组 -> Converts the original byte array to an ASCII-formatted byte array

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.AsciiBytesToBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: 将ascii格式的byte数组转换成原始的byte数组 -> Converts an ASCII-formatted byte array to the original byte array

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.BoolArrayToByte(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: 将bool数组转换到byte数组 -> Converting a bool array to a byte array

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.ByteToBoolArray(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: 从Byte数组中提取位数组，length代表位数 -> Extracts a bit array from a byte array, length represents the number of digits
member.param: 想要转换的长度，如果超出自动会缩小到数组最大长度

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.ByteToBoolArray(System.Byte[])
member.summary: 从Byte数组中提取所有的位数组 -> Extracts a bit array from a byte array, length represents the number of digits

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.SpliceTwoByteArray(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: 拼接2个字节数组成一个数组 -> Splicing 2 bytes to to an array

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.BytesArrayRemoveBegin(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: 将一个byte数组的前面指定位数移除，返回新的一个数组 -> Removes the preceding specified number of bits in a byte array, returning a new array

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.BytesArrayRemoveLast(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: 将一个byte数组的后面指定位数移除，返回新的一个数组 -> Removes the specified number of digits after a byte array, returning a new array

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.BytesArrayRemoveDouble(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: 将一个byte数组的前后移除指定位数，返回新的一个数组 -> Removes a byte array before and after the specified number of bits, returning a new array

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.DeepClone(System.Object)
member.summary: 使用序列化反序列化深度克隆一个对象，该对象需要支持序列化特性 -> Cloning an object with serialization deserialization depth that requires support for serialization attributes
member.returns: 新的一个实例化的对象

remarks.note: 参数必须实现序列化的特性

member.name: M:Pansonic.SoftBasic.GetUniqueStringByGuidAndRandom
member.summary: 获取一串唯一的随机字符串，长度为20，由Guid码和4位数的随机数组成，保证字符串的唯一性 -> Gets a string of unique random strings with a length of 20, consisting of a GUID code and a 4-digit random number to guarantee the uniqueness of the string
